summary.span: 提供靜態方法，協助序列化 (Serialization) 的實作。

span.span: Provides static methods to aid with the implementation of a for serialization.
This class cannot be inherited.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void CheckTypeSecurity (Type t, System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.TypeFilterLevel securityLevel);
.method public static hidebysig void CheckTypeSecurity(class System.Type t, valuetype System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.TypeFilterLevel securityLevel) cil managed
Public Shared Sub CheckTypeSecurity (t As Type, securityLevel As TypeFilterLevel)
public: static void CheckTypeSecurity(Type ^ t, System::Runtime::Serialization::Formatters::TypeFilterLevel securityLevel);
static member CheckTypeSecurity : Type * System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.TypeFilterLevel -> unit

param.name: t
param.span: 要檢查還原序列化能力的 。

span.span: The to check for the ability to deserialize.
The property value.

summary.span: 判斷 屬性設為 時是否可還原序列化指定的 。

span.span: Determines whether the specified can be deserialized with the property set to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法來判斷是否指定的型別可為已還原序列化的時機屬性設定為`Low`。Use this method to determine whether a specified type can be deserialized when the property is set to `Low`. .NET framework 遠端處理提供的自動還原序列化時，兩個層級和。.NET Framework remoting provides two levels of automatic deserialization, and . 可以協助防止還原序列化的最基本的遠端處理功能相關聯的型別還原序列化攻擊。 helps protect against deserialization attacks by deserializing only the types associated with the most basic remoting functionality. 還原序列化層級支援所有型別的自動還原序列化 (遠端處理在所有情況下都支援這些型別)。The deserialization level supports automatic deserialization of all types that remoting supports in all situations. 如需有關.net Framework 遠端處理型別並支援，請參閱[.NET Framework 遠端處理中的自動還原序列化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/5dxse167(v=vs.100))。For more information about the.NET Framework remoting types that and support, see [Automatic Deserialization in .NET Framework Remoting](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/5dxse167(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 此範例示範如何使用類別來序列化或還原序列化的物件的基底類別未實作但衍生的類別。This example shows how to use the class to serialize or deserialize an object where the base class does not implement but the derived class does. [!code-cpp[FormatterServices#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/FormatterServices/cpp/FormatterServices.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[FormatterServices#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/FormatterServices/CS/FormatterServices.cs#1)]

exception.span: 參數為進階型別，而且在 屬性設為 時無法還原序列化。

span.span: The parameter is an advanced type and cannot be deserialized when the property is set to .

related.span: .NET Framework 遠端處理中的自動還原序列化

span.span: Automatic Deserialization in .NET Framework Remoting

The members to extract from the object.

summary.span: 從指定物件擷取資料，並將它傳回為物件陣列。

span.span: Extracts the data from the specified object and returns it as an array of objects.

returns.span: 的陣列，包含儲存於 以及與 相關聯的資料。

span.span: An array of that contains data stored in and associated with .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 針對每個提供的成員`members`陣列方法會擷取與相關聯的值`obj`物件，並傳回它。For each supplied member of the `members` array the method extracts the value associated with the `obj` object, and returns it. 傳回陣列的長度是相同的長度`members`陣列。The length of the returned array is the same as the length of the `members` array. ## Examples 下列範例會建立書籍類別的執行個體，並設定執行個體上的欄位值。The following example creates an instance of a Book class and sets field values on the instance. 此程式碼，然後取得類型資訊使用方法。The code then gets the type information using the method. 程式碼會將執行個體資料複製到物件陣列使用方法。The code copies the instance data into an object array using the method. 使用建立類別的新初始化執行個體方法。A new uninitialized instance of the class is created using the method. 最後，從第一個執行個體的資料會複製到第二個執行個體使用方法。Finally, the data from the first instance is copied into the second instance using the method. [!code-csharp[FormatterServices_PopulateObjects#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/FormatterServices_PopulateObjects/cs/Populate.cs#1)] [!code-vb[FormatterServices_PopulateObjects#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/FormatterServices_PopulateObjects/vb/Populate.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static object GetSafeUninitializedObject (Type type);
.method public static hidebysig object GetSafeUninitializedObject(class System.Type type) cil managed
public: static System::Object ^ GetSafeUninitializedObject(Type ^ type);
static member GetSafeUninitializedObject : Type -> obj

span.span: The type of object to create.

summary.span: 建立指定物件型別的新執行個體。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the specified object type.

returns.span: 指定型別的零位調整物件。

span.span: A zeroed object of the specified type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為物件的新執行個體初始化為零，而且沒有建構函式會執行，該物件可能代表被視為有效的該物件的狀態。Because the new instance of the object is initialized to zero and no constructors are run, the object might not represent a state that is regarded as valid by that object. 應該只用於還原序列化時使用者想要立即填入所有欄位。 should only be used for deserialization when the user intends to immediately populate all fields. 因為建立不可變的類型的空執行個體要不處理任何用途，它不會建立未初始化的字串。It does not create an uninitialized string, since creating an empty instance of an immutable type serves no purpose. 將所有類別層級[連結要求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)要[需求](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5283e28-2366-4519-b27d-ef5c1ddc1f48)以確保所有直接和間接呼叫端有要求指定的權限。 converts all class level [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) to [Demands](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5283e28-2366-4519-b27d-ef5c1ddc1f48) to ensure that all direct and indirect callers have the permissions that the demand specifies. 使用以從部分信任的來源還原序列化時，增加的安全性層級。Use to increase the level of security when deserializing from a partially trusted source. 為了達到最佳效能，在完全信任情況下，使用。For better performance in full trust scenarios, use .

exception.span: 參數為 。

span.span: The parameter is .

exception.span: 參數不是有效的 Common Language Runtime 型別。

span.span: The parameter is not a valid common language runtime type.

exception.span: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

span.span: The caller does not have the required permission.
For providing serialization services.
Associated enumerations: , .

summary.span: 傳回特定類別的所有可序列化成員。

span.span: Returns all the serializable members for a particular class.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Reflection.MemberInfo[] GetSerializableMembers (Type type);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Reflection.MemberInfo[] GetSerializableMembers(class System.Type type) cil managed
public: static cli::array <System::Reflection::MemberInfo ^> ^ GetSerializableMembers(Type ^ type);
static member GetSerializableMembers : Type -> System.Reflection.MemberInfo[]

span.span: The type being serialized.

summary.span: 為指定 的類別取得所有可序列化成員。

span.span: Gets all the serializable members for a class of the specified .

returns.span: 非暫時性、非靜態成員之 型別的陣列。

span.span: An array of type of the non-transient, non-static members.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，可序列化類別的成員會非暫時性、 非靜態成員，例如欄位和屬性。Generally, the serializable members of a class are non-transient, non-static members such as fields and properties. 若要包含在內，屬性必須同時有 getter 和 setter。To be included, properties must have both a getter and a setter. 類別若實作介面，或已序列化 surrogate 不需要序列化所有這些成員，或可序列化的其他成員。A class that implements the interface or has a serialization surrogate does not have to serialize all these members, or can serialize additional members. 因為`GetSerializableMembers`方法呼叫方法，它不會傳回欄位以特定順序，例如依字母順序或依宣告順序。Because the `GetSerializableMembers` method calls the method, it does not return fields in a particular order, such as alphabetical or declaration order. 您的程式碼不得相依於傳回欄位的順序。Your code must not depend on the order in which fields are returned. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫方法的實作方法。The following example calls the method from an implementation of method. [!code-cpp[FormatterServices#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/FormatterServices/cpp/FormatterServices.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[FormatterServices#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/FormatterServices/CS/FormatterServices.cs#2)]

exception.span: 參數為 。

exception.span: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Reflection.MemberInfo[] GetSerializableMembers (Type type, System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Reflection.MemberInfo[] GetSerializableMembers(class System.Type type, valuetype System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context) cil managed
public: static cli::array <System::Reflection::MemberInfo ^> ^ GetSerializableMembers(Type ^ type, System::Runtime::Serialization::StreamingContext context);
static member GetSerializableMembers : Type * System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext -> System.Reflection.MemberInfo[]

param.name: type
param.span: 將序列化或複製的型別。

span.span: The type being serialized or cloned.

param.name: context
param.span: 其中發生序列化的內容。

span.span: The context where the serialization occurs.

summary.span: 為指定 的類別，並在所提供的 中，取得所有可序列化成員。

span.span: Gets all the serializable members for a class of the specified and in the provided .

returns.span: 非暫時性、非靜態成員之 型別的陣列。

span.span: An array of type of the non-transient, non-static members.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，可序列化類別的成員會非暫時性、 非靜態成員，例如欄位和屬性。Generally, the serializable members of a class are non-transient, non-static members such as fields and properties. 若要包含在內，屬性必須同時有 getter 和 setter。To be included, properties must have both a getter and a setter. 類別若實作或已序列化 surrogate 不需要序列化所有這些成員，或可序列化的其他成員。A class that implements or has a serialization surrogate does not have to serialize all these members, or can serialize additional members. 如果`context`包含列舉值，暫時性欄位也會包含在這個方法所傳回的陣列。If `context` includes the enumeration value, transient fields are also included in the array returned by this method. 因為`GetSerializableMembers`方法呼叫方法，它不會傳回欄位以特定順序，例如依字母順序或依宣告順序。Because the `GetSerializableMembers` method calls the method, it does not return fields in a particular order, such as alphabetical or declaration order. 您的程式碼不得相依於傳回欄位的順序。Your code must not depend on the order in which fields are returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為物件的新執行個體初始化為零，而且沒有建構函式會執行，該物件可能代表被視為有效的該物件的狀態。Because the new instance of the object is initialized to zero and no constructors are run, the object might not represent a state that is regarded as valid by that object. 目前的方法應該僅用於還原序列化時使用者想要立即填入所有欄位。The current method should only be used for deserialization when the user intends to immediately populate all fields. 因為建立不可變的類型的空執行個體要不處理任何用途，它不會建立未初始化的字串。It does not create an uninitialized string, since creating an empty instance of an immutable type serves no purpose. > [!NOTE] > 您無法使用方法用來建立衍生自型別的執行個體類別。You cannot use the method to create instances of types that derive from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果中的項目`data`已`null`，不寫入任何內容至該欄位。If an element in `data` is `null`, does not write anything to that field. ## Examples 下列範例會建立書籍類別的執行個體，並設定執行個體上的欄位值。The following example creates an instance of a Book class and sets field values on the instance. 此程式碼，然後取得類型資訊使用方法。The code then gets the type information using the method. 程式碼會將執行個體資料複製到物件陣列使用方法。The code copies the instance data into an object array using the method. 使用建立類別的新初始化執行個體方法。A new uninitialized instance of the class is created using the method. 最後，從第一個執行個體的資料會複製到第二個執行個體使用方法。Finally, the data from the first instance is copied into the second instance using the method. [!code-csharp[FormatterServices_PopulateObjects#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/FormatterServices_PopulateObjects/cs/Populate.cs#1)] [!code-vb[FormatterServices_PopulateObjects#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/FormatterServices_PopulateObjects/vb/Populate.vb#1)]
